addonDesc.message: Opens pages based on the day of the week

dailyMenuItem.description: The label for the menu item that adds a site to every day

addPageLabel.description: Label for top-level menu item where users go to add pages

openPagesTooltip.description: Browser action tooltip describing action of opening all pages configured for today

optionsLoadRandomLabel.description: Label for the checkbox that enables opening pages in random order

optionsCloseOpenTabsLabel.message: Close open tabs when opening pages
optionsCloseOpenTabsLabel.description: Label for the checkbox that enables closing current tabs

optionsAllowDupeSitesLabel.message: Allow duplicate sites in a day
optionsAllowDupeSitesLabel.description: Label for checkbox that enables duplicate sites stored under a single day

optionsSaveButton.description: Label on the button that saves settings
